mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_material (theme_id , material_id , title , content) VALUES (#{themeId} , COALESCE ((SELECT MAX(material_id) + 1 FROM t_material WHERE theme_id = #{themeId}), 1) , #{title} , #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT theme_id , material_id , title , content FROM t_material WHERE theme_id = #{themeId} AND material_id = #{materialId}
